summary: This is an email forwarding a zip folder containing exhibits pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell's renewed bail application. It was sent by a paralegal specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York to unspecified recipients.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the renewed bail application for which exhibits are being forwarded.

events.title: Renewed Bail Application Filed
events.description: The defense filed a renewed motion for bail for Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A renewed bail application was filed for Ghislaine Maxwell on or before December 8, 2020.
Exhibits supporting the bail application were compiled and forwarded via email on December 9, 2020.
The communication originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York, indicating ongoing federal prosecution.
